tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.13
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayBOUNDARY False isArrayWIND False isArrayOBSERVED False output_data_B_GRID $output_data_B_GRID output_data_WINDCORR $output_data_WINDCORR name SAGA.climate_tools.13 BOUNDARY $BOUNDARY WIND $WIND OBSERVED $OBSERVED B_SOURCE $B_SOURCE B_CONST $B_CONST B_MAX $B_MAX B_STEPS $B_STEPS KERNEL_TYPE $KERNEL_TYPE KERNEL_SIZE $KERNEL_SIZE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_B_GRID $OutputSection_B_GRID.outputType_B_GRID transmissionMode_B_GRID $OutputSection_B_GRID.transmissionMode_B_GRID outputType_WINDCORR $OutputSection_WINDCORR.outputType_WINDCORR transmissionMode_WINDCORR $OutputSection_WINDCORR.transmissionMode_WINDCORR

param.name: BOUNDARY
param.label: Boundary Layer
param.help: The absolute vertical distance to the boundary layer. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: WIND
param.label: Wind Effect
param.help: Wind Effect The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: OBSERVED
param.label: Observations
param.help: Observations used for local scaling factor calibration (e.g. precipitation, cloudiness). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: B_CONST
param.label: Constant Scaling Factor
param.help: Constant scaling factor used in the wind effect correction.

param.name: KERNEL_TYPE
param.label: Kernel Type
param.help: Kernel specification used to request observations for local scaling factor calibration.

param.name: KERNEL_SIZE
param.label: Kernel Size
param.help: Kernel specification used to request observations for local scaling factor calibration.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_B_GRID
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_B_GRID
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_WINDCORR
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
